meka.gui.core

Class MekaFileChooser

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JFileChooser
            • meka.gui.core.MekaFileChooser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MekaFileChooser
extends javax.swing.JFileChooser
    A file chooser dialog with directory bookmarks.
    Version:
    $Revision: 8361 $
    Author:
    fracpete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • MekaFileChooser

        public MekaFileChooser()
        Constructs a MekaFileChooser pointing to the user's default directory. This default depends on the operating system. It is typically the "My Documents" folder on Windows, and the user's home directory on Unix.

      • MekaFileChooser

        public MekaFileChooser(java.lang.String currentDirectoryPath)
        Constructs a MekaFileChooser using the given path. Passing in a null string causes the file chooser to point to the user's default directory. This default depends on the operating system. It is typically the "My Documents" folder on Windows, and the user's home directory on Unix.
        Parameters:
        currentDirectoryPath - a String giving the path to a file or directory

      • MekaFileChooser

        public MekaFileChooser(java.io.File currentDirectory)
        Constructs a MekaFileChooser using the given File as the path. Passing in a null file causes the file chooser to point to the user's default directory. This default depends on the operating system. It is typically the "My Documents" folder on Windows, and the user's home directory on Unix.
        Parameters:
        currentDirectory - a File object specifying the path to a file or directory
